title: This is still a thing.

embed.description: To escape Lee Sin, you need to put distance between you and him AFTER he lands Resonating Strike and jumps to you, but BEFORE he can land Tempest/Cripple to slow you. Unfortunately he can be spamming E while in-flight during Resonating Strike, so he can cast Tempest/Cripple almost immediately upon landing, so your only hope is to flash in the instant after he lands Resonating Strike.

body:
Its coming on a year now since this video, 
_(and god knows how long it was around before then)_.

It still hasn't been fixed.
So I'm doing my civic duty and reminding everyone.
We wouldn't want it to be forgotten.

Its not a minor thing either, it kills people on a near daily basis _(at least from my games)_.

Hopefully we see a fix soon.

replies.body:
Just a reminder - if you find a bug/exploit, the OCE boards aren't really the place to put them as we don't get as much traffic. 

Try over on the specific [ report a bug board ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report)if this hasn't already been reported over there. Rioters regularly check this board for issues that players have picked up.  Make sure to[ follow the guidelines](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug) when doing so ♥

I have posted it there before.
But nothing has comes of it, so I figure the best way to get it solved is to get the community behind it. Raise awareness etc. :P

_(The lack of any Red comments on the report a bug page doesn't leave me brimming with confidence ether.)_
